{{menutrail|Main menu}} [[File:OptionsMenu.png|thumb|The options menu in [[Harmony]].]]The '''options menu''' is the portal to access all settings in [[ZDoom]] by way of its many submenus. Its [[MENUDEF]] name is <tt>OptionsMenu</tt> and it can be summoned with the [[console command]] <tt>menu_options</tt>. *'''[[Customize controls]]''' :{{c|{{CCMD|O|menu_keys}}}} :Lets you rebind or unbind actions to keys and mouse or joystick buttons. *'''[[Mouse options]]''' :{{c|{{CCMD|O|menu_mouse}}}} :Lets you enable or disable the mouse, change horizontal and vertical sensibility, set [[mouselook]] and other options. *'''[[Joystick options]]''' :{{c|{{CCMD|O|menu_joystick}}}} :Lets you enable or disable game controllers, and support for DirectInput, XInput, and PS2 controllers.
*'''[[Player setup]]''' :{{c|{{CCMD|O|menu_player}}}} :Allows to chose name, [[team]], uniform color, [[class]], [[skin]], gender, and [[autoaim]] behavior. *'''[[Gameplay options]]''' :{{c|{{CCMD|O|menu_gameplay}}}} :Gives an interface to affect a number of [[CVARs]]. *'''[[Compatibility options]]''' :{{c|{{CCMD|O|menu_compatibility}}}} :Allows to choose compatmodes and reestablish bogus behavior. *'''[[Automap options]]''' :{{c|{{CCMD|O|menu_automap}}}} :Allows to change how the [[automap]] works and looks. *'''[[HUD options]]''' :Allows to affect the in-game interface. *'''[[Miscellaneous options]]''' :Controls various settings such as node caching, autosave behavior, and others. *'''[[Network options]]''' :Controls netgame specific settings for the local player and arbitrator. *'''[[Sound options]]''' :{{c|{{CCMD|O|menu_sound}}}} :Allows to change the [[MIDI device]], among other settings. *'''[[Display options]]''' :{{c|{{CCMD|O|menu_display}}}} :Allows to affect messages and [[scoreboard]] options, as well as select a [[crosshair]] and choose whether to use the [[alternate HUD]]. *'''[[Set video mode]]''' :{{c|{{CCMD|O|menu_video}}}} :Changes the display resolution and aspect ratio.
*'''Reset to defaults''' :{{c|{{CCMD|O|reset2defaults}}}} :Erases the current configuration and restores default values throughout. *'''Reset to last saved''' :{{c|{{CCMD|O|reset2saved}}}} :Erases any change done during the current ZDoom session. *'''Go to console''' :{{c|{{CCMD|O|menuconsole}}}} :Opens the [[console]], useful if the key bound to {{c|{{CCMD|P|toggleconsole}}}} does not work.
